## Bibliografia

### Básica

- DE ALMEIDA, Pedro Quaresma. Introduçao ao LATEX. Escolar Editora, 1996.
- RUBINSTEIN, Reuven Y; KROESE, Dirk P. Simulation and Monte Carlo method. 2nd ed. New Jersey, Estados Unidos: Wiley-Interscience, 2008.
- DAVISON, A. C; HINKLEY, D. V. Bootstrap methods and their application. New York, Estados Unidos: Cambridge University Press, 1997.
- EFRON, Bradley; TIBSHIRANI, Robert. An introduction to the bootstrap. Boca Raton, Estados Unidos: Chapman & Hall/CRC, 1994.
- VERZANI, John. Using R for introductory statistics. Boca Raton, Estados Unidos: Chapman & Hall/CRC, 2005.

### Complementar

- RIZZO, Maria L. Statistical computing with R. CRC Press, 2019.
- GIVENS, Geof H.; HOETING, Jennifer A. Computational statistics. John Wiley & Sons, 2012.
